context: Fox announced on <a5_0>May 11, <a0_0>20<a1_0>1<a2_0>5<a5_0/><a2_0/><a1_0/><a0_0/> that the fifteenth season would be the final season of American Idol; as such, the season is expected to have an additional focus on the program's alumni. <a4_0><a6_0>Ryan Seacrest<a6_0/><a4_0/> returns as host, with Harry Connick Jr., Keith Urban, and Jennifer Lopez all returning for their respective third, fourth, and fifth seasons as <a3_0>judges<a3_0/>.
